charges.charge_description: 18:1542.F FALSE STATEMENT IN APPLICATION/USE OF PASSPORT (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft sentenced to 41 months imprisonment on each Cts 1 in 98-cr-245 and Ct 1 in 98-cr-414, to run concurrently; Deft placed on supervised release for 5 years on Ct 1 in 98-cr-245 and 3 years on Ct 1 in 98-cr-414 to run concurrently for a total term of 5 years; Deft to submit to substance abuse treament/testing; Deft not to re-enter the US w/out prior written permission; Deft to pay $100.00 special assessment on each count for a total assessment of $200.00; Deft to forfeit items and property as stated (1)
